verses.verse: Then he brought me forth<WH3318> into the outer<WH2435> court,<WH2691> the way toward<WH1870> the north:<WH6828> and he brought<WH935> me into the room<WH3957> that was over against the separate place,<WH1508> and which was over against the building<WH1146> toward the north.<WH6828>
Before<WH6440> the length<WH753> of one hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520> was the north<WH6828> door,<WH6607> and the breadth<WH7341> was fifty<WH2572> cubits.<WH520>

Over against the twenty<WH6242> cubits which belonged to the inner<WH6442> court,<WH2691> and over against the pavement<WH7531> which belonged to the outer<WH2435> court,<WH2691> was gallery<WH862> against<WH6440> gallery<WH862> in the third story.<WH7992>

Before<WH6440> the rooms<WH3957> was a walk<WH4109> of ten<WH6235> cubits<WH520>' breadth<WH7341> inward,<WH6442> a way<WH1870> of one<WH259> cubit;<WH520> and their doors<WH6607> were toward the north.<WH6828>

Now the upper<WH5945> rooms<WH3957> were shorter;<WH7114> for the galleries<WH862> took away<WH398> from these,<WH2007> more than from the lower<WH8481> and the middle,<WH8484> in the building.<WH1146>

For they were in three<WH8027> stories,<WH5982> and they didn't have pillars as the pillars<WH5982> of the courts:<WH2691> therefore the uppermost was straitened<WH680> more than the lowest<WH8481> and the middle<WH8484> from the ground.<WH776>

The wall<WH1447> that was outside<WH2351> by the side<WH5980> of the rooms,<WH3957> toward<WH5980> the outer<WH2435> court<WH2691> before<WH6440> the rooms,<WH3957> its length<WH753> was fifty<WH2572> cubits.<WH520>

For the length<WH753> of the rooms<WH3957> that were in the outer<WH2435> court<WH2691> was fifty<WH2572> cubits:<WH520> and behold,<WH6440> before the temple<WH1964> were one hundred<WH3967> cubits.<WH520>
From under these rooms<WH3957> was the entry<WH3996> on the east side,<WH6921> as one goes<WH935> into them<WH2007> from the outer<WH2435> court.<WH2691>

In the thickness<WH7341> of the wall<WH1444> of the court<WH2691> toward<WH1870> the east,<WH6921> before<WH6440> the separate place,<WH1508> and before<WH6440> the building,<WH1146> there were rooms.<WH1508>

The way<WH1870> before<WH6440> them was like the appearance<WH4758> of the way of the rooms<WH3957> which were toward<WH1870> the north;<WH6828> according to their length<WH753> so was their breadth:<WH3651> and all their exits<WH4161> were both according to their fashions,<WH4941> and according to their doors.<WH6607>

According to the doors<WH6607> of the rooms<WH3957> that were toward<WH1870> the south<WH1864> was a door<WH6607> at the head<WH7218> of the way,<WH1870> even the way<WH1870> directly<WH1903> before<WH6440> the wall<WH1448> toward<WH1870> the east,<WH6921> as one enters into them.<WH935>

Then he said<WH559> to me,<WH6828> The north rooms<WH3957> and the south<WH1864> rooms,<WH3957> which are before<WH6440> the separate place,<WH1508> they are the holy<WH6944> rooms,<WH3957> where the priests<WH3548> who are near<WH7138> to Yahweh<WH3068> shall eat<WH398> the most<WH6944> holy things:<WH6944> there shall they lay<WH3240> the most<WH6944> holy things,<WH6944> and the meal offering,<WH4503> and the sin offering,<WH2403> and the trespass offering;<WH817> for the place<WH4725> is holy.<WH6918>

When the priests<WH3548> enter<WH935> in,<WH935> then shall they not go out<WH3318> of the holy<WH6944> place into the outer<WH2435> court,<WH2691> but there they shall lay<WH3240> their garments<WH899> in which they minister;<WH8334> for they are holy:<WH6944> and they shall put<WH3847> on other<WH312> garments,<WH899> and shall approach<WH7126> to that which pertains to the people.<WH5971>

Now when he had made an end<WH3615> of measuring<WH4060> the inner<WH6442> house,<WH1004> he brought me forth<WH3318> by the way<WH1870> of the gate<WH8179> whose prospect<WH6440> is toward<WH1870> the east,<WH6921> and measured<WH4058> it all around.<WH5439>
He measured<WH4058> on the east<WH6921> side<WH7307> with the measuring<WH4060> reed<WH7070> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> reeds,<WH7070> with the measuring<WH4060> reed<WH7070> all around.<WH5439>
He measured<WH4058> on the north<WH6828> side<WH7307> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> reeds<WH7070> with the measuring<WH4060> reed<WH7070> all around.<WH5439>
He measured<WH4058> on the south<WH1864> side<WH7307> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> reeds<WH7070> with the measuring<WH4060> reed.<WH7070>
He turned about<WH5437> to the west<WH3220> side,<WH7307> and measured<WH4058> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> reeds<WH7070> with the measuring<WH4060> reed.<WH7070>

He measured<WH4058> it on the four<WH702> sides:<WH7307> it had a wall<WH2346> around<WH5439> it,<WH753> the length five<WH2568> hundred,<WH3967> and the breadth<WH7341> five<WH2568> hundred,<WH3967> to make a separation<WH914> between that which was holy<WH6944> and that which was common.<WH2455>
